description:
WeTube is the premier YouTube app for HP webOS.

**New: Fullscreen support has been added!**

- Play YouTube videos right inside the app.
- Integrates VEVO videos seamlessly.
- View popular, top rated, most recent and most discussed videos right from the home screen.
- Search for videos.
- View comments.
- View related videos.
- Share the video you're watching via Twitter.

WeTube provides you with an extremely elegant and clean interface that makes watching YouTube videos much more enjoyable than going to the YouTube website on your TouchPad.



Support & Feedback:
Use our support system: http://support.kandutech.com
Contact me on Twitter: @mynamesconnor



**Future Planned Updates**
- More sharing options.
- JustType support.
- Browse tab to filter videos by category.
- Ability to post comments, and rate videos.
- Login functionality.
